title: Hecarim - The pony needs more boots.
body:
So we have {{champion:120}}  Hec, the guy who loves to run at things really really fast. But surely he finds it hard when only 2 of his hooves have a pair of swifty boots on. Cmon, he has four hooves riot, let the pony wear two pairs of boots instead of one so he can run freely like he's supposed to. 

Really though, I'd totally give up another item slot for another pair of boots on him. 

Riot pls?
